meanings.definition: Feeling or showing concern or anxiety about something.
meanings.sent1: She looked worried about the upcoming test.
meanings.sent2: The worried mother waited for news about her child.
meanings.sent3: The worried squirrel kept checking if it buried its acorn.
meanings.sent4: The worried clouds gathered, hinting at an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: His worried expression spoke volumes about his inner turmoil.

meanings.definition: Feeling uneasy or troubled about something.
meanings.sent1: He felt worried when he heard strange noises at night.
meanings.sent2: The worried cat hid under the bed during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent3: The worried toaster refused to pop up the toast, causing a breakfast delay.
meanings.sent4: The worried river rushed through the valley, eroding the banks.
meanings.sent5: The worried student chewed on their pencil during the exam.
